title: Who Are You Following? | Sadie Robertson Huff, Demi Tebow & Bella Robertson Mayo
description:
Bella Robertson Mayo and Demi Tebow join Sadie to kick off the launch of her new book, “Who Are You Following?” In a deeply personal conversation, they reveal the highs and lows of social media in their lives and discuss toxic Instagram and Snapchat culture, intentionality about what you share, the lies social media can tell you, why you are the ultimate influencer, and how social media can give you a powerful platform to be the light of the world.
-
